SELECT B.*, U.user_name AS userName FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, F.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM free_board ORDER BY free_no ASC
) F ) B JOIN user_info U ON B.user_no = U.user_no WHERE B.rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT A.*, U.user_name AS userName FROM announce_board A JOIN user_info U ON A.user_no = U.user_no
SELECT E.*, U.user_name AS userName FROM event_board E JOIN user_info U ON E.user_no = U.user_no
